author: Staff Reporter
text:
As part of S. Rajam’s 97{+t}{+h}birth anniversary celebrations, which will be organised by Sunaada Trust, S. Rajam’s Award of Excellence will be conferred upon Bharatanatyam exponent Nandini Ramani, Villuppattu exponent Subbu Arumugam and music composer Rajkumar Bharathi at Narada Gana Sabha in Mylapore on Wednesday.

According to a press release, P. Venkat Rangan, vice-chancellor, Amritha University, will be the chief guest and deliver the keynote address while R. T. Chari, managing director, TAG Group of Companies, will give a special address.

Felicitations to the awardees on the occasion will be given by Priyadarshini Govind, director, Kalakshetra, and V. Ramnarayan, editor-in-chief, Sruti.

On Tuesday, K. Ayyanar, regional director, Indian Council for Cultural Relations, will preside over Akhila Bharatiya Harikatha Utsav at Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan in Mylapore, the release added.
title: Artistes to be honoured
